mission.title: Empowering Versatile Learners
mission.description: Learning should be fun and inspiring. Zeta English Academy helps students build a strong foundation for future success with engaging lessons, supportive coaching, and space to share their ideas.

pillars.title: Versatile
pillars.description: We develop adaptable, curious learners who are ready for academic and life challenges.

pillars.title: Instrumental
pillars.description: We teach real-world communication, critical thinking, and confident self-expression.

pillars.title: Strategic
pillars.description: We guide each student with personalized planning, thoughtful feedback, and clear structure.

programLevels.title: Our Program
programLevels.intro: Zeta's core classes blend reading, grammar, and discussion so learners grow in comprehension, accuracy, and confident expression.

levels.name: LAB - Guided Reading for Fluency
levels.summary: Build confidence through leveled books, one-on-one coaching, and the joy of every story.

levels.name: Grammar - Write Clearly, Speak Powerfully
levels.summary: Interactive grammar workshops that build strong sentences, smart vocabulary, and fluent writing.

levels.name: Discussion - Speak Boldly, Think Deeply
levels.summary: Literature, debate, and projects come together to grow confident, critical English thinkers.

testimonials.quote:
"The atmosphere in class was what I loved most. Instead of cramming information, we spent a lot of time talking together and sharing feedback, so it felt like real communication and made learning fun.

Unlike typical academies, the teacher’s constant communication with us is the biggest feature and strength of these lessons."
testimonials.name: Cindy

testimonials.impactPhrase: Joyful learning that stretches real-world English.
testimonials.quote:
"What sets Brent’s class apart is that it never felt rigid. Even though improving our English was the goal, he guided us through all kinds of experiences inside that goal. He connected English with different activities so we could enjoy it, and helped me see the language as a gateway to broader experiences, not just a school subject.

If I had studied the same way as everyone else somewhere else, I don’t think I’d be using English as such a natural part of everyday life now."
testimonials.name: Denny

testimonials.impactPhrase: Challenging projects that build lasting confidence.
testimonials.quote:
"What I remember about Brent’s lessons is that they were free yet always asked us to take on new challenges. Every topic and theme required us to try something different.

Those experiences became a major strength when I attended university lectures in English or collaborated with students from different backgrounds. They gave me the foundation to connect with many perspectives and fields."
testimonials.name: Zion
